effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise a random stat by two stages.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP to boost a random stat by two stages.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ポケモンに　持たせると
ピンチのとき　どれか　１つの
能力が　ぐーんと　あがる。

A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon.
If a Pokémon holds one, one of its stats
will sharply increase when it’s in a pinch.

Se il Pokémon che ha questa bacca si trova
in difficoltà, una delle sue statistiche aumenta
di molto.

Si lo lleva el primer Pokémon del equipo, se
reduce la probabilidad de que se acerquen
Pokémon salvajes.

Als getragenes Item erhöht diese Beere einen
Statuswert des Pokémon stark, sobald es in
einer Notlage steckt.

Tenue, cette Baie augmente beaucoup une
des stats en cas de besoin.

포켓몬에게 지니게 하면
위급할 때 능력 중의 하나가
크게 올라간다.

ポケモンに　もたせると
ピンチのとき　どれか　１つの
のうりょくが　ぐーんと　あがる。

If held by a Pokémon, it sharply raises
one of its stats in a pinch.

If held by a Pokémon, it sharply raises
one of its stats in a pinch.

Tenue, cette Baie monte beaucoup une
des stats en cas de besoin.

If held by a Pokémon, it sharply raises
one of its stats in a pinch.

A Poffin ingredient.
If held by a Pokémon, it sharply raises
one of its stats in a pinch.

A Poffin ingredient.
If held by a Pokémon, it sharply raises
one of its stats in a pinch.

When held by a POKéMON, it sharply
raises one stat in a pinch.

A hold item that
sharply boosts a
stat in a pinch.

sharply boosts a
stat in a pinch.
